statements: SELECT title, author FROM tutorials;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE category = 'Programming';
SELECT title, content FROM tutorials WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT category, author FROM tutorials ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM tutorials;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE category = 'Programming' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM tutorials WHERE author LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY tutorial_id ASC;
SELECT tutorial_id, title, category FROM tutorials WHERE category IN ('Database', 'Frontend') LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE author = 'Alice' OR category = 'Design' ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT title, category FROM tutorials WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY category, title DESC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_description FROM tutorials;
SELECT tutorial_id, tutorial_title, tutorial_url FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM guides ORDER BY guide_rating DESC;
SELECT guide_title, guide_category, guide_url FROM guides WHERE guide_category = 'Programming' ORDER BY guide_title ASC;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_description FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id = 1;
SELECT guide_title, guide_url, guide_rating FROM guides WHERE guide_category = 'Programming' ORDER BY guide_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_url LIKE '%sql%';
SELECT guide_title, guide_category FROM guides WHERE guide_rating > 3 ORDER BY guide_title ASC;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_description FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM tutorials ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_description FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_url FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_description LIKE '%beginner%';
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id = 1;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_url FROM tutorials ORDER BY tutorial_title DESC;
SELECT users.username, tutorials.tutorial_title, progress.completed FROM users JOIN progress ON users.user_id = progress.user_id JOIN tutorials ON tutorials.tutorial_id = progress.tutorial_id;
SELECT tutorial_title, tutorial_description FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT tutorial_url FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY tutorial_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, author FROM tutorials WHERE author='John Smith';
SELECT title, content FROM tutorials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT tutorial_id, author, content FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id=100;
SELECT author_name, expertise_area FROM authors ORDER BY expertise_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author, content FROM tutorials WHERE author='John Doe';

SELECT title, author, category_name FROM tutorials JOIN tutorial_categories ON tutorials.tutorial_id=tutorial_categories.tutorial_id JOIN categories ON tutorial_categories.category_id=categories.category_id;
SELECT author_name, expertise_area, COUNT(tutorial_id) AS tutorial_count FROM authors LEFT JOIN tutorials ON authors.author_name=tutorials.author GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT title, author, content FROM tutorials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' AND content LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY tutorial_id;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, author FROM tutorials WHERE category = 'Tech';
SELECT tutorial_id, title FROM tutorials WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM steps ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC, step_number ASC;
SELECT tutorial_id, COUNT(*) AS total_steps FROM steps GROUP BY tutorial_id;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, author FROM tutorials WHERE category='Programming' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT t.title, r.rating FROM tutorials t JOIN ratings r ON t.tutorial_id = r.tutorial_id WHERE r.rating > 4.5;
SELECT t.title, COUNT(s.step_id) AS num_steps FROM tutorials t JOIN steps s ON t.tutorial_id = s.tutorial_id GROUP BY t.title HAVING num_steps > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT c.category_name FROM categories c JOIN tutorials t ON c.category_name = t.category ORDER BY c.category_name;
